verses.verse: Judge <S%H8199><s%> me <S%H430><s%>, O God, and plead <S%H7378><s%> my cause <S%H7379><s%> against an ungodly <S%H3808><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%>: Oh deliver <S%H6403><s%> me from the deceitful <S%H4820><s%> and unjust <S%H5766><s%> man <S%H376><s%>.

For thou art the God <S%H430><s%> of my strength <S%H4581><s%>; Why hast thou cast me off <S%H2186><s%>? Why go <S%H1980><s%> I mourning <S%H6937><s%> because of the oppression <S%H3906><s%> of the enemy <S%H341><s%>?

Oh send out <S%H7971><s%> thy light <S%H216><s%> and thy truth <S%H571><s%>; Let them lead <S%H5148><s%> me <S%H935><s%>: Let them bring me unto thy holy <S%H6944><s%> hill <S%H2022><s%>, And to thy tabernacles <S%H4908><s%>.

Then will I go <S%H935><s%> unto the altar <S%H4196><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, Unto God <S%H410><s%> my exceeding <S%H8057><s%> joy <S%H1524><s%>; And upon the harp <S%H3658><s%> will I praise <S%H3034><s%> thee <S%H430><s%>, O God, my God <S%H430><s%>.

Why art thou cast down <S%H7817><s%>, O my soul <S%H5315><s%>? And why art thou disquieted <S%H1993><s%> within me <S%H3176><s%>? Hope thou in God <S%H430><s%>; For I shall yet praise <S%H3034><s%> him <S%H3444><s%>, Who is the help of my countenance <S%H6440><s%>, and my God <S%H430><s%>.
